title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, April 4, 2021
description: This Easter marks the birthday of two American icons: poet, writer, and activist Maya Angelou (1928), and blues musician and songwriter Muddy Waters (1915).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: This Easter marks the birthday of two American icons: poet, writer, and activist Maya Angelou (1928), and blues musician and songwriter Muddy Waters (1915).
